name: Carlos Alcaraz
short_description: Aggressive baseline, relentless drive, focuses on improvement and intensity.
description: Known for his aggressive baseline play and powerful groundstrokes, Alcaraz is a fearless competitor who mixes athleticism with a relentless drive to push forward and seize control of rallies. His approach embodies intensity and youthful energy, with a focus on constant improvement and strategic shot-making.

name: Alexander Zverev
short_description: Powerful serve, consistent pace, controls rallies with precision and patience.
description: Zverev emphasizes a strong serve and powerful backhand, using his height to his advantage in delivering precise, high-speed serves. Known for his patience and control, he often looks to outlast his opponents by maintaining a consistent pace and forcing errors through extended rallies.

name: Stefanos Tsitsipas
short_description: Creative, versatile, adapts tactics mid-game, blends variety and athleticism.
description: Blending athleticism with creativity, Tsitsipas plays with a versatile style, incorporating slice backhands, drop shots, and powerful forehands. His approach involves both tactical variety and mental resilience, often adapting his game mid-match to counter his opponentsâ€™ strengths.

name: Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard
short_description: Dominates with serve, offensive focus, capitalizes on height advantage.
description: With a focus on powerful serves and an imposing net game, Mpetshi Perricard leverages his height to dominate on serve and quickly close out points. His approach prioritizes offensive play, particularly on faster surfaces, where he can use his size and power to control the game early in rallies.
